articles.title: Police reports on Lindani Myeni shooting in Hawaii 'one-sided', his family says - News24
articles.description: The 29-year-old South African was allegedly shot by the Hawaii police multiple times when they responded to a burglary in progress.
articles.content:
• The family of Lindani Myeni, who was shot and killed in Hawaii, says police reports on the incident are one-sided.
  • Myeni was accused of burglary and of assaulting police officers.

articles.author: Davina Tham

articles.title: President of Chad Idriss Deby dies in clashes with rebels one day after winning election - Sky News
articles.description: One of Africa's longest ruling leaders, he died the day after he had won a sixth term in office with more than 79% of the votes.

articles.title: Military: Chadian President Idriss Deby Itno killed after 30 years in power - CTV News
articles.description: Chadian President Idriss Deby Itno, who ruled the central African nation for more than three decades, died Tuesday of wounds suffered on the battlefield during a fight against rebels, the military announced on national television and radio.
articles.content:
